description: A push-button, which returns to inactive position when not operated anymore.

contents.name: pressed
contents.description: Indicates whether the button is currently active (pressed).

contents.name: click_hold_time
contents.description: Threshold for `click` and `hold` events (see event descriptions below).

contents.name: down
contents.description: Emitted when button goes from inactive (`pressed == 0`) to active.

contents.name: up
contents.description:
Emitted when button goes from active (`pressed == 1`) to inactive. The 'time' parameter 
records the amount of time between the down and up events.

contents.name: click
contents.description: Emitted together with `up` when the press time less than or equal to `click_hold_time`.

contents.name: hold
contents.description: Emitted when the press times is greater than `click_hold_time`. Hold events are followed by a separate up event.
